betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6ME Controller§r is essentially §ethe heart of your to-be ME Storage System§r. Even though you can still make one without one, it's still recommended for you to get as it gives you an amount of §e32 channels for each of the block's sides§r, thus maximizing the amount of channels used. It can also work as a multiblock when you §econnect it together with other ME Controllers§r. If it shows as it's normal form then you're good to go. If it's §ccolored red then there's something wrong with your multiblock structure§r.

To craft it, you'll need four §6Sky Stone Block§rs, four §6Pure Fluix Crystal§rs, and an §6Engineering Processor§r.
